summary: Ever wanted to feel like Van Helsing? There you go.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4] This mod doesn't replace the default crossbow or its stats. This mods adds an other crossbow that called ''Crossbow of Death'' to the game.[/size]  
  
[size=6][center]STATS[/center][/size][list][center]
[*]650 Base Damage
[*]Instant Reload
[*]%100 Chance to Paralize[/center][/list]
[size=6][center]Install[/center][/size][size=3][center]Simply drag the .esp to your data folder and then enable it.[/center][/size] 
[size=6][color=green][center]How to Get It[/center][/color][/size][size=3][center]Open the console and type ''help crossbow 4''. You should see ''Crossbow of Death''. Type 'player.additem xxxx 1''. x is the ID number. You can also craft it.[/center][/size]If you liked this crossbow, you may also like my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58632/?]Long Bow of Death.[/url]
author: ProtologolusX
